title: Digital warriors giving India a tough time are truly commendable:Rana Mashood
content:
ISLAMABAD, May 14 (APP):Chairman Prime Minister Youth Program (PMYP) Rana Mashood Ahmed Khan Wednesday said Young people are our future,we are investing on them and the young individuals who have safeguarded the nation’s borders by sacrificing their lives, especially the digital warriors who have given India a tough time are truly commendable.
He expressed these views while addressing a ceremony at Rootes International School stated at present, more than 200,000 job opportunities are available on the Digital Youth  Hub,underscoring the programme’s commitment to empowering the next generation.
He stated that in the realm of IT and technology, Pakistan has made significant strides, positioning itself well ahead of India.
He said that the youth of other provinces in Punjab have been given scholarships in different universities and colleges.                           He said that young people are being loaned on easy terms under the Prime Minister’s Youth Program for their startups, young people are being given innovation awards on modern ideas and  they will be launched in the name of the Excise Program next year.
He said that the pitch Pakistan program will be launched from next week which will give talented youth an opportunity to express their capabilities.
He said that several steps are being taken under the Prime Minister’s Youth Program to empower the youth.                                                    He said that young scholarships, employment and other opportunities should use digital Youth Hub for information and awareness.
He said that so far more than 8 million youths have been provided with various jobs and it is our goal to provide job opportunities to 1.5 million youth by December adding that modern training modules have been set up for the youth.                                                                        He said that exports of IT sector have risen from two and a half billion dollars to $ 5 billion, which will take it to $ 25 billion in the next two years.
He said that “we have fought for the restoration of the country’s economy saying that we are proud that in 1998, former Prime Minister Nawaz Sharif carried out nuclear blasts and  In the same period, JF -17 Thunder was included in Pak Air Force, we worked for development in every sector.
He said that the world is acknowledging the capabilities of Pakistan, there are huge opportunities for Pakistani youth.                             He said that the digital warrior that secures the country’s borders by sacrificing his lives is commendable and he has proved that India is not ahead of us in the field of IT and technology, but we are far more ahead of India.                                                                                   All the countries of the world have praised Pakistan’s victory against India,he stated.
